section.title: Creating a VMware Alarm Alert
section.para: CloudForms Management Engine can use VMware alarms as a trigger for an alert. This type of alert can be created for a cluster, host, or virtual machine.

procedure.title: To Create a VMware Alarm Alert

step.para:
Click the Alerts accordion, then click
(Configuration),
(Add a new Alert).
Type in a description for the alert.
From Based On, select Cluster, Host, or VM.
For What to Evaluate, select VMware Alarm.
In Notification Frequency, select how often you want to be notified if the log item is detected.
In the VMware Alarm Parameters area select the provider and alarm.

After setting the parameters, you then select what you want the alert to do. You can send an email, create an SNMP Trap, let the alert show on the timeline, or send a management event to start an automation process.
